posts.post_content:
I believe I have Allen & Ginter:
1.The World’s Champions 2nd Series Album A17, 
2.George Washington Album A20,
3.World’s Inventors
4.Our Navy
5.50 Fish From American Waters
6.Napoléon Album (Front cover, back cover, 3 inside pages)?
7.Kinney Bros. Liberty Album


These are not cards.

I am interested in selling. Based on my online research it looks as though some pages may have been trimmed. I do not see holes for string binding. Not sure.

Someone mentioned cutting cards from albums. This seems as though it would devalue them.

Some are blank back (Champions). The inventors have printing on the backs as do others.

I can email photos.
You might have better luck with this query on the non-sports side.  The link is in the top right corner of each page of this forum.  Good luck.
Thanks. I'll try there as well.
